Hello.message: Hello, this bot is designed to download video and audio from YouTube, select from the menu what you want to download.

Text.download: Select from the menu what you want to download.
Text.convert: Select from the menu what you want to convert.
Text.video: Select from the menu what you want to do with the video.

Long.restrictions:
Send a link to the video.
⚠️ Video should not last more than 7 minutes.
Long.duration: ⚠️ Video should not last more than 7 minutes.

Audio.restrictions:
Send a link to the video.
⚠️ Video should not weigh more than 50mb.

VideoNote.restrictions:
Send a link to the video.
⚠️ Video should not last more than 7 minutes.
VideoNote.duration: ⚠️ Video should not last more than 7 minutes.

NewsLetter.message: Select from the menu what you want to do.

ParsingUsers.restrictions: Send a link to the channel.

Parsing.message: Choose from the menu what needs to be parsed.

Video.shortsMessage: Send me a link to the video.

Convert.message: Select from the menu what you want to convert.

Loading.loading: Wait for the previous video to be installed.
